metadata.title: STORM-FEST SAO Special Observations

creators.name: UCAR, Joint Office for Science Support (JOSS), Joint Office for Science Support

metadata.description: Wind direction/speed, ceiling height, visibility. dry bulb temperature, wet bulb temperature, dew point temperature, sea level and station pressure, cloud data, and present weather.  Manual and automatic observations for special conditions that arose at about 1200 NWS, FAA,  Coast Guard, and DOD sites for STORM-FEST.
